Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.view.Components

Interface IBoardView

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoardView
public interface IBoardView
Interface defining the contract for visual board representation in the Battleship game. Provides methods for drawing cells and marking different cell states such as hits, misses, ships, and sunk ships.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clear()
    Clears all cells on the board, resetting them to their initial state.
    void
    drawCell(Coordinate coordinate, String color)
    Draws a cell with the specified color.
    void
    markHit(Coordinate coordinate)
    Marks a cell as hit, displaying a hit indicator.
    void
    markMiss(Coordinate coordinate)
    Marks a cell as a miss, displaying a miss indicator.
    void
    markShip(Coordinate coordinate)
    Marks a cell as containing a ship.
    void
    markSunk(Coordinate coordinate)
    Marks a cell as part of a sunk ship.
    void
    refresh()
    Refreshes the visual state of all cells on the board.

  • Method Details

    • drawCell

      void drawCell(Coordinate coordinate, String color)
      Draws a cell with the specified color.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to draw
      color - the color to apply in hexadecimal format

    • markHit

      void markHit(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as hit, displaying a hit indicator.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • markMiss

      void markMiss(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as a miss, displaying a miss indicator.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • markShip

      void markShip(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as containing a ship.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • markSunk

      void markSunk(Coordinate coordinate)
      Marks a cell as part of a sunk ship.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - the coordinate of the cell to mark

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears all cells on the board, resetting them to their initial state.

    • refresh

      void refresh()
      Refreshes the visual state of all cells on the board.
